eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 03:27 AM ON OCT 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:54 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Gilbert Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety.  The Gilbert Police Department is looking for 35 year old Ammon Hardt.  Ammon is an Hispanic male, 5 feet 4 inches tall, 120 pounds, with black eyes and black hair.  Ammon was last seen at 2200 hours on 10/10/25 on foot near East Coldwater Boulevard and South Penrose Drive.  He is believed to be wearing a white tank top and black shorts.  Ammon suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become disoriented or easily confused.  If you have seen Ammon, please contact the Gilbert Police Department at 480 503 6500 or call 911. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
